root.name: Tekken X Street Fighter
root.description: OverviewTekken X Street Fighter is a crossover 3D fighting game that is being developed by Namco Bandai; it was announced at the 2010 San Diego Comic-Con alongside Street Fighter X Tekken. Little is known about the game, as Namco Bandai has stayed quiet on its development while Capcom prepares the release of Street Fighter X Tekken. According to Street Fighter producer Yoshinori Ono, the Tekken X Street Fighter and Street Fighter X Tekken teams will not collaborate in any way.

similar_games.game: Marvel vs. Capcom 3: Fate of Two Worlds
